rooms.description: Mediterranean-themed living room with large windows for natural light and ventilation, open-plan design. Wheelchair accessible.
Open dining area adjoining the kitchen. Incorporates a Mediterranean style with earthy colors and textured materials.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen designed for accessibility with wheelchair-friendly layout and natural light.
Cozy library area with built-in shelves, ample window space to ensure good lighting, and ergonomic furniture accessible from a wheelchair perspective.
Spacious entrance with clear pathways and wide doorways for easy accessibility.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom on ground floor.

openings.description: Wider than standard to meet wheelchair accessibility requirements, with glass panels for natural light.
Access door leading to a small balcony that connects the living room to the rooftop terrace.

rooms.description: Large master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, designed with Mediterranean style and ample natural light through large windows. Wheelchair accessible closet area included.
Guest bedroom with built-in storage and accessible design features.
Additional guest bedroom, designed for wheelchair accessibility with minimal floor level transitions.
En-suite bedroom with a bathroom fully equipped and accessible, featuring large windows for natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible lift integrated into staircase area to connect levels safely. Alternatively, a ramp is provided if stairs are not used.
Access door leading from first floor to rooftop terrace. Designed with wide entry for wheelchair access.

vastu_considerations.north_elevation: Large windows and doors on the north side to maximize natural light and positive energy.
vastu_considerations.south_elevation: Solid walls with minimal openings, adhering to Vastu guidelines for privacy and warmth retention.
vastu_considerations.east_elevation: Incorporation of Mediterranean design elements like terracotta tiles for balance.
vastu_considerations.west_elevation: Utilization of natural ventilation features such as cross ventilation windows.

mediterranean_features.roof_style: Mediterranean roof with red clay tiles, designed to enhance natural ventilation.
